name: updateCertificate
description: Provide updated information for a certificate object.

id.description: ID of certificate object to update.

body.description: Patch request to update a certificate object.

$ul: **expiration**: The expiration date for the certificate.

**hasKey**: A Boolean value that specifies whether or not the certificate is associated with a stored private key. When this value is 'true,' the private key for the certificate is stored. When this value is 'false,' the private key for the certificate is not stored.
**usedBy**: A list of components using the certificate.
